title: Macassa Lodge
description: Roles include: Pastoral Care, Physiotherapy, REC - Lodge Wilde, REC – Small Group.

title: Wentworth Lodge
description: Volunteers can assist with:Recreation programs,Friendly Visiting, Special events and inhouse service, hairdressing/barber and physio,Tuck Shop sales of snacks both food and drinks, toiletries and seasonal items.

title: Beautify Hamilton
description: Volunteers can pick a clean up spot around the city and take a before and after photo to submit on their own time.

title: Cancer Assist Program
description: Provide essential transportation for individuals attending cancer-related medical appointments within the greater Hamilton area.

title: Cancer Assist Program
description: Welcome and register clients for their wide range of practical services. This role also offers the opportunity to engage in administrative duties, such as data entry, front desk reception and handling phone calls.

title: Cancer Assist Program
description: Volunteers work in the shop located within the office to repair and/or sanitize donated and returned home health equipment.

title: Cancer Assist Program
description: Collaborate with the Manager of Fund Development and/or Coordinator, Special Events and Community Fundraising to plan, execute, and promote one or more of CAP’s four signature fundraising events.

title: Cancer Assist Program
description: Offer support and assistance during CAP’s signature fundraising events.

title: Habitat for Humanity
location: 1525 Stone Church Rd E Hamilton, ON
description: Assist with customer service including loading and unloading items, organizing merchandise, tidying and cleaning and answering customer questions.

title: Habitat for Humanity
location: 1525 Stone Church Rd E Hamilton, ON
description: Ensure items are in good working order by testing, fixing, repairing and assembling items.

title: Hamilton/Burlington SPCA
description:
This opportunity would be right for you if: - You are pet and people focused

- You enjoy meeting and greeting new people

- You are an individual with a sense of commitment and passion for what you do.

title: Hamilton/Burlington SPCA
description: Greet customers with warmth and provide excellent customer service. You will help customers with inquiries about our store products and prices and assist with inventory transport, tracking, and management. Through your efforts in merchandising and sorting our products, you will contribute to enhancing the store displays and setting up and cleaning them regularly.

title: Hamilton/Burlington SPCA
description: This role will involve general administrative tasks, responding to calls and emails, data entry and scheduling assistance.

title: Hamilton/Burlington SPCA
description: Help custodial staff keep the facility clean and neat by dusting, vacuuming, moping, cleaning restrooms and assisting with the removal of garbage and recycling.

title: Hamilton Health Sciences
description: St. Peters Hospital:Palliative Care 3E & 3W - Friendly Visiting, Behavioral Health Assistant, Medically Complex Friendly Visitor, Restorative Care Gym Assistant, Hamilton General Hospital
